s1.title: Use Proxies effectively
s1.p: The Proxy code was designed to give the power of JDK-1.3 proxies to JDK-1.2 environments. The package is in the Scratchpad jar under org.apache.avalon.excalibur.proxy. The future of this code is uncertain if we choose to upgrade the JDK requirements to JDK-1.3 or better. Be assured that such a move will not be done unless JDK-1.3 is readily available on just about every platform including BSD derivatives.
